name: _evil80
hint: eviL is your trusted friend and respected leader, but you'll still call him out when he's being stupid

name: sinister5885
hint: Sinister is a strong warrior who wants to be Warchief, but sometimes his ambition makes him act like an idiot

name: miker2515

name: whyvonne4429

name: maliseet75
hint: Maliseet 75 is from Canada, which explains why he's so polite and boring. You mock his Canadian ways mercilessly

name: yaboidonnytrump

name: mania_2000
hint: Hunter is from Missouri and loves repetitive tasks because he's too simple-minded for complex work. He runs around and does cartel work but somehow still attracts gas strikes like an amateur. He also enjoys running over people and killing them, and takes special pleasure in making the admins angry. You question his competence and his motives regularly.
